properties.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 1 at 8:32PM PST until February 2 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow above 3000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2
to 4 inches.

* WHERE...Craigmont, Nezperce, Winchester, and Soldiers Meadow
Road.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on
Highways 95 and 62

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Falling snow levels and temperatures will
cause the rain to change snow this evening, while the intensity
of snow increases overnight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET
